name: 1GAW - Week 4
description:
Note: This game was made as part of the "Stop Waiting for Godot" Game Jam

In this very small game, you play as a very hungry slime that has a bad case of diarrhea. I don't know why I made this game, to be entirely honest. Forgive me.

The goal is to eat the food, and try to avoid eating your own poo!

Source code: https://github.com/Reccy/1GAW_4

Controls:

WSAD to Move

Assets Used:

"Wind Chime, Gamelan Gong, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

"ambient meadow near forest single bird and eurasian cranes in background stereo XY MK012.wav" by Soundholder (www.soundholder.com) of Freesound.org

"small-realpoot113.wav" by Jixolros of Freesound.org

"small-realpoot114.wav" by Jixolros of Freesound.org

"Damage Hit Voice Vocal" by dersuperanton of Freesound.org

"Nom Noise" by NillyPlays of Freesound.org

"Video Game Die" by blosche of Freesound.org
